markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 338 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Baalzebul](/Deities.aspx?ID=63), [Cayden Cailean](/Deities.aspx?ID=4), [Chaldira](/Deities.aspx?ID=35), [Lahkgya](/Deities.aspx?ID=191), [The Laborer's Bastion](/Deities.aspx?ID=253), [Uvuko](/Deities.aspx?ID=228), [Yog-Sothoth](/Deities.aspx?ID=166)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +30-foot status bonus to your Speed.
name: Fleet Step

text: Fleet Step Source Core Rulebook pg. 338 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Deities Baalzebul, Cayden Cailean, Chaldira, Lahkgya, The Laborer's Bastion, Uvuko, Yog-Sothoth Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Duration 1 minute --- You gain a +30-foot status bonus to your Speed.
